    anchor_sections: FALSE
    includes:
      in_header: "header_manual.html"

params:
  year_curr: 2024 # Current year of sampling
  park: "ACAD"
  all_years: TRUE # If FALSE, only reports on year_curr; TRUE reports on all years; Not fully enabled for FALSE yet.

```{r setup, include = F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '', scipen = 100)
```

```{r imports, include = FALSE}
library(rockyIntertidal)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
#library(htmltools) # for tagList
library(DT)
library(htmlwidgets)

importData()
park = params$park
year_curr = params$year_curr
year = 2013:year_curr

# year = 2013:2024
# park = "ACAD"
# year_curr = 2024

arglist <- list(park = park, years = year)

locs <- do.call(getPIBoltDistance, arglist) |>
  select(SiteCode) |> unique() |> c() #|> as.character()
```
